name: Snale - Chapter 1
description:
Uh oh. Your snirlfriend (snail girlfriend) Snaley just got kidnapped!! This is bad. Set off on an adventure to save her!

Snale is a character-driven tragicomedy about discovery and what happens when you're forced to see things you'd rather ignore– about yourself and the world around you.

Snilliam leaves home for the first time on a quest to the Great Sunflower in order to save his snirlfriend. But.. she isn’t at the Great Sunflower. And he keeps refusing help. Uncover his past as you follow his exploration of the world you’ve both been thrown into. Something strange is going on, and everyone he encounters seems to be on a quest of their own…

Snale - Chapter One is around 3-4 hours long.
